tool.name: mgaps

param.name: header
param.label: Header
param.help: Check that fasta header labels alternately have 'Reverse'

param.name: diagonal
param.label: Fixed diagonal difference to join matches

param.name: extent
param.label: Extent
param.help: Use extent of match (end - start) rather than sum of piece lengths to determine length of cluster

param.name: fraction
param.label: Fraction of separation for diagonal difference

param.name: max
param.label: Maximum separation between matches in cluster

tool.help: This program reads lists of unique matches between a sequence of strings and a reference string. For each string in the sequence, it clusters the matches together into groups that may represent longer, in exact matches.
